UpperBoundTypeVS ValueSet

Indicates the actual value is lt (<) or lte (<=) the given value.

description: Indicates the actual value is lt (<) or lte (<=) the given value.

concept.display: The actual value is less than the given value.
The actual value is less than or equal to the given value.
